basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MBC=1496 µg/ml), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 4352 (MBC=1496 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538 and ATCC 25923 (MBC=1496 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051 (MBC=1995 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 10231 (MBC=3200 µg/ml).
